Name: City of Scary Zombies
About the game: City of Scary Zombies is 3D survival shooter about one of the surviving residents of a city where a terrible zombie apocalypse happened many years ago. You and a group of rebels must maintain life at your base, you will be subordinate to the head of the base. He will give you tasks, you will go alone to an abandoned city. Each raid will be responsible. Before leaving, buy ammo and medicines, after completing the task, get a reward, buy the necessary things again and go on a new path. A large city of 8 square kilometers awaits you. Its inhabitants are zombies. And you are a stranger. Many houses were covered with snow and literally buried in the ground, where once there were entrances, everything was overgrown with dense thickets, trees and grass. Each road, alley, courtyard is not your city, it is a city of zombies, they will definitely look for you. Do not stop ! Good luck !
